text:
© 2017 Dave J Hogan (Getty Images)

Sienna Miller is not “cozying up” to Ben Affleck for movie roles, despite a new report. Gossip Cop can exclusively correct the claim. We’re told it’s “not true.”

Life & Style alleges that Affleck and Miller’s “offscreen chemistry, particularly some super-flirty photos of them at the flick’s London premiere, has been causing more buzz than the movie itself.” The publication then claims to have “the real reason” Miller has been getting “so touchy-feeling with Ben.” A so-called “insider” is quoted as telling the tabloid, “She wants to keep these big parts coming in.”

The magazine contends that even though Live By Night didn’t do well at the box office, “Ben’s track record as a director is impressive,” and lists his successes such as Gone Baby Gone and Argo. “It’s no wonder Sienna wants to ensure parts in more of Ben’s future movies,” writes the outlet. “Sienna truly values Ben’s advice and direction while filming, and Ben’s a big flirt, so it doesn’t hurt for Sienna to stroke his ego,” adds the tabloid’s supposed “insider.”

Gossip Cop will cut to the chase. Staying friendly with directors is good business, but one has to also be right for the role. Regardless, an impeccable Miller source tells Gossip Cop the claim is “definitely not true.”

It would probably be wise, at this point, for Life & Style, to steer clear of stories relating to Affleck. Remember, this is the same publication that falsely claimed in a cover story that Jennifer Garner was pregnant with Affleck’s fourth child in April 2016. And just a few months ago, Gossip Cop busted the tabloid when it wrongly reported Affleck was back together with Jennifer Lopez. Maybe it’s time the magazine begins “cozying up” to better sources.
title: Sienna Miller “Cozying Up” To Ben Affleck For Movie Roles?
